DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to characterize the acute effects of cannabinoids in women relative to men and to begin probing the mechanisms that may underlie gender differences.
DOC.brief_title: Gender Related Differences in the Acute Effects of Delta-9-Tetrahydrocannabinol in Healthy Humans
DOC.criteria: at least one lifetime exposure to cannabis good physical and mental health cannabis naive individuals major current or recent stressors taking estrogen supplements or oral contraceptive pills (for women)
